snippet: The German airline said that the planned three-day strike threatened to affect more than 425,000 passengers across its global network.
abstract: German airline Lufthansa warns that three-day strike planned by its largest pilots' union threatens to affect more than 425,000 passengers across its global network.
lead_paragraph: The German airline said that the planned three-day strike threatened to affect more than 425,000 passengers across its global network.

headline.main: Lufthansa Warns of Disruptions if Strike Occurs
headline.print_headline: Lufthansa Warns of Disruptions if Its Pilots Go Out on Strike
